question.title: What is the primary method for compulsory follow-up consultations for infants and children?
question.description: The method of compulsory follow-up consultations for infants and children.

option_a.title: Health insurance claim
option_a.description: The child's family submits a claim to the health insurance company.

properties.option_b: Compulsory health examinations by the child's GP, paediatrician or general practitioner
properties.option_c: Compulsory health examinations by the PMI (up to the age of 6) only
properties.option_d: Health insurance claim and compulsory health examinations by the child's GP, paediatrician or general practitioner
